items.optimalFarmSize: Calculations use optimal farm size: {{width}} x {{height}}

errors.network: An error occurred fetching item details, please refresh the page and try again.

selector.label: Item:
selector.placeholder: Select an item to use in calculations

workers.label: Output item workers:
workers.error: Invalid output item workers, must be a positive non-zero whole number

amount.label: Output item target:
amount.error: Invalid output item target, must be a positive non-zero whole number

error.unhandled: An error occurred while calculating output, please change inputs and try again.

settings.description: By default, the calculator will use the recipe with the highest output per second unless an override is applied.

about.source: Calculations use public game data files from the <repoLink>Colony Survival repository</repoLink>.

errors.UNKNOWN: An error occurred, please try again.
errors.INVALID_ITEM_ID: Invalid item ID provided, must be a non-empty string
errors.INVALID_WORKERS: Invalid number of workers provided, must be a positive number
errors.INVALID_TARGET: Invalid target output provided, must be a positive number
errors.TOOL_LEVEL: Unable to create item with available tools, minimum tool is: {{requiredTool}}
errors.TOOL_LEVEL_MACHINE: Unable to create item with available tools, requires machine tools
errors.MULTIPLE_OVERRIDE: More than one creator override provided for: {{itemId}}
errors.INVALID_OVERRIDE_ITEM_NOT_CREATABLE: Item is not creatable with current overrides
